name: miHoYo Genshin Impact Forum Dark Mode Theme
description:
Dark mode theme for miHoYo's Genshin Impact forum; rest your eyes specially at night.

All forum sites should be included (the main homepage is not included only forum sites).
If you spot something that is missing just let me know in the comments here or in my original post on miHoYo's forum about the dark mode theme.

https://forums.mihoyo.com/genshin/article/85980

Have fun travelers o/
